titleStmt.title: Some remarks on the life, death, and burial of Mr. Henry Cornish, B.D., an eminent dissenting teacher who died on Sunday, Dec. 18, and was interr'd on Thursday, Dec. 22, 1698, in the church of Bisiter in the county of Oxford as received in a letter from a friend.
titleStmt.author: Kennett, White, 1660-1728.

notesStmt.note: Written by White Kennett. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
